key.name: delay
key.description: Number of seconds to wait before taking a screenshot

key.name: screenshot-mode
key.description: What to take a screenshot of; either screen, window or selection

key.name: last-save-directory
key.summary: Index of the last used directory
key.description: Index of the last used directory. If default user-dirs are there, index equals Enum from: UserDirectory https://valadoc.org/glib-2.0/GLib.UserDirectory.html. in case of index error, fallback is user home directory

key.name: file-type
key.summary: File type to save the screenshot
key.description: The filetype for the screenshot to be saved in

key.name: include-frame
key.summary: Include window frame in the screenshot
key.description: Wether to include the window frame in the screenshot or not

key.name: showtooltips
key.description: Wether to show tooltips on headerbar buttons or not

key.name: include-cursor
key.summary: Include the cursor in the screenshot
key.description: Wether to include the cursor in the screenshot or not
